name: good vibes throw
notes:
step far out of your comfort zone and get lost in color while making the good vibes throw. i pulled together colors i never thought i'd use and crocheted this fun and funky lap blanket. it uses a simple but striking stitch pattern to really let the color shine. create your own mood by building a color palette that is uniquely you. 

*find this pattern free on [tlycblog.com][1]*

**pattern highlights**

-a simple stitch pattern really lets your favorite colors shine in this bold, modern crochet throw blanket. 
-this pattern is beginner friendly and includes a full video tutorial plus some tips on how i really make the colors pop.
-easily adjust this blanket to the size you need! the pattern includes instructions on how to increase or decrease the width and the length. 

**available sizes:**
one size, but easily adjustable

**suggested yarn:**
caron simply soft speckles and solids

**hooks used:**
5.5mm crochet hook

**notions used:**
-scissors
-tapestry
